directions.dialogText: Use the NEW function \`move(number)\` along with \`getAcorn()\` to direct the squirrel to get the acorn with only TWO LINES of code!

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Type \`move(4);\` then \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: This time you can only use THREE LINES of code!

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\`, \`up()\`, and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Type \`up();\`, then \`move(5);\`, then \`getAcorn();\` and run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Ok, you can only use FOUR LINES of code on this level!

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\`, \`up()\`, and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Type \`move(3);\`, then \`up();\`, then \`move(2);\`, and finally \`getAcorn();\`. Run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

quiz.text: Which of the following could NOT be a function name?
In \`move(3);\`, which part is the parameter?

directions.dialogText: You will only need FIVE LINES of code this time.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\`, \`up()\`, \`right()\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`right()\`- face right

\`up()\`- face up

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Type \`up()\`, then \`move(5);\`, then \`right();\`, then \`move(5);\`, and finally \`getAcorn();\`. Run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Good job so far! You can use SIX LINES this level.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\`, \`up()\`, \`right()\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`right()\`- face right

\`up()\`- face up

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Type  \`move(2);\`, then \`up();\`, then \`move(3);\`, then \`right();\`, then \`move(3);\` and finally \`getAcorn();\`. Run your code. Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: This level will take SEVEN LINES of code.

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\`, \`up()\`, \`right()\`, \`left()\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`right()\`- face right

\`left()\`- face left

\`up()\`- face up

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Pay attention to spelling, punctuation and capitalization!

directions.dialogText: Do whatever you want on this level!!!

levels.mission: By calling the functions \`move(number)\`, \`up()\`, \`down()\`, \`right()\`, \`left()\` and \`getAcorn()\` in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to get the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`right()\`- face right

\`left()\`- face left

\`up()\`- face up

\`down()\`- face down

\`move(number)\`- move forward that number of squares

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Crank up the speed and climb around the trees!!!
